mapper.select:
/* getInsideCodeList */ SELECT * FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_INSIDE_CODE WHERE ACTIVE = 'Y'
AND INSIDE_MD_CODE = #{insideMdCode}
mapper.insert: /* setAssetInfo */ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_INFO ( AST_CODE_COMPANY_ID, AST_CODE_TYPE_ID, AST_CODE_ID_1, AST_CODE_ID_2, AST_CODE_ID_3, AST_STS_CODE, AST_PLACE_SN, AST_NAME, PURC_DATE, PURC_PRICE, PURC_COMPANY_ID, STANDARD, MODEL_NAME, MF_COMPANY, ORG_COUNTRY, QTY, UNIT, REG_TYPE, BARCODE_TYPE, FUNDING_SOURCE, EXP_ACCOUNT, EMP_NAME, PURPOSE, REMARK, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{astCodeCompanyId}, #{astCodeTypeId}, #{astCodeId1}, #{astCodeId2}, #{astCodeId3}, #{astStsCode}, #{astPlaceSn}, #{astName}, #{purcDate}, #{purcPrice}, #{purcCompanyId}, #{standard}, #{modelName}, #{mfCompany}, #{orgCountry}, #{qty}, #{unit}, #{regType}, #{barcodeType}, #{fundingSource}, #{expAccount}, #{empName}, #{purpose}, #{remark}, #{empSeq} )
mapper.update: /* setAssetCodePositionUpd */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE_POSITION SET AST_CP_CODE = #{astCpCode}, AST_CP_CODE_NM = #{astCpCodeNm}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, MOD_DATE = NOW() WHERE AST_CODE_COMPANY_ID = #{astCodeCompanyId}
/* setAssetCodePositionDel */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE_POSITION SET ACTIVE ='N' WHERE AST_CODE_COMPANY_ID IN (${astCodeCompanyId})

/* setClassDivisionUpd */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE_CLASS SET AST_TYPE_CODE = #{astTypeCode}, AST_TYPE_CODE_NM = #{astTypeCodeNm}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, MOD_DATE = NOW() WHERE AST_CODE_TYPE_ID = #{astCodeTypeId}
/* setClassDivisionDel */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE_CLASS SET ACTIVE ='N' WHERE AST_CODE_TYPE_ID IN (${astCodeTypeId})

/* setAssetPlaceUpd */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_PLACE SET AST_PLACE_NAME = #{astPlaceName}, AST_MANAGE_DEPT = #{astManageDept}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, MOD_DATE = NOW() WHERE AST_PLACE_SN = #{astPlaceSn}
/* setAssetPlaceDel */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_PLACE SET ACTIVE ='N' WHERE AST_PLACE_SN IN (${astPlaceSn})
mapper.insert: /* setCategoryCode */ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE ( AST_UPPER_CODE, AST_CODE, AST_CODE_NM, AST_DEPRE_TYPE, AST_DEPRE_PERCENT, AST_USE_YEAR, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{astUpperCode}, #{astCode}, #{astCodeNm}, #{astDepreType}, #{astDeprePercent}, #{astUseYear}, #{empSeq} )
mapper.select: /* getMaxCategoryCode */ SELECT RIGHT(CONCAT('00', IFNULL(max(AST_CODE), 0) + 1), 2) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE A WHERE AST_UPPER_CODE = #{astUpperCode}
mapper.update: /* setCategoryCodeDel */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE SET ACTIVE ='N' WHERE AST_CODE_ID IN (${astCodeId})
mapper.select: /*getEqipmnList*/ SELECT CM_CODE_NM AS TEXT, CM_CODE_ID AS VALUE FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_COM_CODE WHERE CM_GROUP_CODE_ID = 1
/*getEqipmnNameList*/ SELECT eqipmn_name AS TEXT, eqipmn_mst_sn AS VALUE FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_MST WHERE eqipmn_gbn_cmmn_cd_sn = #{eqipmnGbnCmmnCdSn}
/*getPrtpcoGbnNameList*/ SELECT CM_CODE_NM AS TEXT, CM_CODE_ID AS VALUE FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_COM_CODE WHERE CM_GROUP_CODE_ID = 2
SELECT * FROM cam_inside.dj_asset_code WHERE ACTIVE = 'Y'
SELECT distinct a.AST_GROUP_CODE_ID, a.AST_MC_CODE, a.AST_MC_CODE_NM FROM cam_inside.dj_asset_code AS a
SELECT distinct a.AST_MD_CODE, a.AST_MD_CODE_NM FROM cam_inside.dj_asset_code AS a WHERE a.ACTIVE = 'Y' and a.AST_MC_CODE = #{AST_MC_CODE}

SELECT a.AST_DT_CODE, a.AST_DT_CODE_NM, CONCAT(a.AST_MC_CODE,a.AST_MD_CODE,a.AST_DT_CODE) AS 'AST_CODE' FROM cam_inside.dj_asset_code AS a WHERE a.ACTIVE = 'Y' and a.AST_MC_CODE = #{AST_MC_CODE} and a.AST_MD_CODE = #{AST_MD_CODE}
mapper.update: /* setEquipmenUseUpdate */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_USE SET eqipmn_mst_sn = #{eqipmnMstSn}, use_pd_str_de = #{usePdStrDe}, use_pd_end_de = #{usePdEndDe}, user_name = #{userName}, user_sn = #{userSn}, oper_cn = #{operCn}, use_time = #{useTime}, use_amt = #{useAmt}, prtpco_gbn_name = #{prtpcoGbnName}, prtpco_gbn_sn = #{prtpcoGbnSn}, reg_de = #{regDe}, sort_sn = #{sortSn}, updt_dt = NOW(), updusr_sn = #{updusrSn} WHERE eqipmn_use_sn = #{pk}
mapper.select: /*getEqipmnUseUpdateList*/ SELECT A.eqipmn_use_sn as EQIPMN_USE_SN, A.sort_sn as SORT_SN, B.eqipmn_mst_sn as EQIPMN_MST_SN, B.eqipmn_gbn_name as EQIPMN_GBN_NAME, B.eqipmn_gbn_cmmn_cd_sn as EQIPMN_GBN_CMMN_CD_SN, B.eqipmn_name as EQIPMN_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(A.use_pd_str_de, '%Y-%m-%d') as USE_PD_STR_DE, DATE_FORMAT(A.use_pd_end_de, '%Y-%m-%d') as USE_PD_END_DE, A.user_name as USER_NAME, A.oper_cn as OPER_CN, A.use_time as USE_TIME, A.use_amt as USE_AMT, A.client_prtpco_name as CLIENT_PRTPCO_NAME, A.prtpco_gbn_name as PRTPCO_GBN_NAME, A.prtpco_gbn_sn as PRTPCO_GBN_SN, A.actvt_yn as ACTVT_YN, DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_de, '%Y-%m-%d') as REG_DE FROM cam_inside.dj_eqipmn_use A LEFT JOIN cam_inside.dj_eqipmn_mst B ON A.eqipmn_mst_sn = B.eqipmn_mst_sn WHERE A.eqipmn_use_sn = #{pk}

/* getBookList */ SELECT RE.* FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROW_NUM, IBI.* FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_BOOK_INFO IBI, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) TMP WHERE 1=1
AND (IBI.BK_LG_CD_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%') OR IBI.BK_MD_CD_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%') OR IBI.BK_CD_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%'))
AND IBI.BK_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND IBI.BK_WRITER like CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND IBI.BK_BUYER_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND IBI.BK_REPL like CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
ORDER BY IBI.REG_DT ) RE ORDER BY RE.ROW_NUM DESC
mapper.insert: /* setBookInsert */ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_BOOK_INFO ( BK_LG_CD, BK_LG_CD_NAME, BK_MD_CD, BK_MD_CD_NAME, BK_CD, BK_CD_NAME, BK_NAME, BK_WRITER, BK_PUBL, BK_BUY_COST, BK_BUY_CNT, BK_BUY_DT, BK_BUYER, BK_BUYER_NAME, BK_USER, BK_USER_NAME, BK_MNG_SEQ, BK_MNG_NAME, BK_MNG_SUB_SEQ, BK_MNG_SUB_NAME, BK_SMRY, BK_REPL ) VALUES ( #{bklgcd}, #{bklgcdname}, #{bkmdcd}, #{bkmdcdname}, #{bkcd}, #{bkcdname}, #{bkname}, #{bkwriter}, #{bkpubl}, #{bkcost}, #{bkcnt}, #{bkbuydt}, #{bkbuyer}, #{bkbuyername}, #{bkuser}, #{bkusername}, #{bkmngseq}, #{bkmngname}, #{bkmngsubseq}, #{bkmngsubname}, #{bksmry}, #{bkRepl} )
